Text:
Thanks scene4all!!! Just finally got around to installing after having dwnl & seeded a while ago. I thought it didn't work, but I thought I would check comments on your upload after getting SN invalid. What was tripping me up a bit was  the config file. Once I read your info about it being "pd.config" and where to locate it, I tried keygenerator again & it worked. 

Thanks for hard work.
